item.title: Network Infrastructure, Part 2
item.description: In this episode, Corey, Dee and Jessie talk to Assistant Professor of electrical and computer engineering at Carnegie Mellon University, Giulia Fanti & member of the Vac research development group at Status, Hanno Cornelius about privacy and security in the network layer.

item.title: Personals - Lucian Stroie
item.description: In this Hashing It Out Personals episode, we talk to Lucian Stroie, Senior Technical Product Manager at Ava Labs and Founder at Coral.

item.title: Flash Hash: Sept 11, 2022
item.description: This episode includes the Ethereum merge, Crypto Leaks piece on Avalanche and Kyle Roche, and decentralized weather stations.

item.title: Network Infrastructure, Part 1
item.description: In this episode, Corey, Dee and Jessie talk to Assistant Professor of electrical and computer engineering at Carnegie Mellon University, Giulia Fanti & member of the Vac research development group at Status, Hanno Cornelius.

item.title: Personals - Ari Juels
item.description: Today we’ll be talking with Ari Juels. Juels is Co-Director of the Initiative for CryptoCurrencies and Contracts (IC3). He is also Chief Scientist at Chainlink Labs and a Professor in the Jacobs Technion-Cornell Institute at Cornell Tech. We’ll be talking about his work and what motivates him.

item.title: Hardware Infrastructure, Part 2
item.description: In part 2 of our hardware infrastructure episode, Corey, Dee and Jessie talk to DAppNode founder, Edu Antuña and Pol Lanski with DAppNode business and ecosystem development about how they got their start and what they envision for the future.

item.title: Flash Hash: Feb 15, 2023
item.description: Executive Producer, Christian, attempts to keep Corey, Dee, and Jessie on topic and within two a minutes a piece on three timely topics.

item.title: Hardware Infrastructure, Part 1
item.description: In this episode, Corey, Dee and Jessie talk to Rick Dudley , President of Vulcanize & TrueBlocks Founder, TJ Rush, about blockchain hardware.

item.title: Personals - Steven McKie
item.description: In this Hashing It Out Personals episode, we talk to the Founding Partner & CEO of Amentum Investment Management, Steven McKie.

item.title: Blockchain Security, Part 1
item.description: Corey, Dee, and Jessie talk to Mehdi Zerouali, Director at Sigma Prime, about security on the blockchain.

item.title: Application, Part 1
item.description: Hashing It Out is continuing its series on the blockchain infrastructure with the Application layer. In this episode, Corey and Jessie talk to Patrick McCorry, of Infura and Lemniscap.

item.title: Application Infrastructure, Part 2
item.description: In this episode, Corey, Dee and Jessie talk to Head of Engineering at Ava Labs, Patrick O’Grady.

item.title: Flash Hash: Jan 17, 2023
item.description: Executive Producer, Christian, attempts to keep Corey, Dee, and Jessie on topic and within two a minutes a piece on three timely topics.

item.title: Flash Hash: Jan 09, 2023
item.description: Executive Producer, Christian, attempts to keep Corey, Dee, and Jessie on topic and within two a minutes a piece on three timely topics.

item.title: Personals - Dee Ferguson
item.description: In this Hashing It Out Personals episode, we flip the script and talk to Hashing It Out host, Dee Ferguson.
